About.Hours & facilities: Open every Sunday 2-5pm, other times by appointment. General reference assistance on request in person or by mail. Copying services can be arranged for photographs for a fee. Research on local and family history by mail for a fee.

About.Access: Archival material not on open access. Access can be arraanged by authorisation from the Museum curator.

About.Acquisition focus: Local and family history material for Molong and District areas which is included in the Cabonne council area.

About.Major holdings: Local archival material Small local newspaper collection (1920-present, some years missing) Photographs (local area and pioneers) Miscellaneous records (1856-present) Museum items include several interesting historical artifacts and a small fossil and mineral collection

Contact.Street address: Molong Historical Museum, Cnr Riddell & Gidley Streets, Molong
